#summary Maven dependency details.

= Introduction =

The Mutability Detector is now available with maven (and compatible build tools) from Maven Central.


= Details =

The dependency snippet for Mutability Detector is:

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mutabilitydetector</groupId>
  <artifactId>MutabilityDetector</artifactId>
  <version>0.6</version>
  <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

For users of other dependency/build tools, the relevant information is:

|| Group ID	|| Artifact ID	|| Version ||
|| org.mutabilitydetector	|| !MutabilityDetector	|| 0.6 ||
